about_the_game:
"

Grimmerspace Xeno Files

Over 40 hideous, mind-bending horrors for your Starfinder Roleplaying Game
From unthinkable wildlife and fiendish aliens on exotic planets to disgusting abominations creeping through the void of space and across dimensions, these monsters not only provoke palpable fear among players, their very existence brings unforgettably cinematic adventure to your own setting, the official Starfinder setting, or the Grimmerspace setting!

Each extensively detailed creature comes with a host of deeply unsettling special abilities and an intriguing background, ranging from wasteland-speeding mutants and agony-fueled, sentient constructs to customizable kaiju, not to mention an entire lost race of incorporeal bogeypeople waiting on the other side of the mirror for the chance to possess us.

 In Xeno Files you'll find the following, unless it finds you first:

  • 40 nerve-rattling monsters, ranging from the CR 1 yhalkym, a devious trap maker bent on cruelest revenge, to the CR 25 zyrag, a draconic starship level construct!

  • New afflictions, creature companions, environmental grafts, subtypes, technologies, template grafts, universal monster rules, weapons, and more!

  • Jumpstart your adventures with the mysteries revealed in a monster's Secrets section!

  • Eyewitness case reports help bring every Xeno Files monster to nightmarish life!
"
detailed_description:
"

Grimmerspace Xeno Files

Over 40 hideous, mind-bending horrors for your Starfinder Roleplaying Game
From unthinkable wildlife and fiendish aliens on exotic planets to disgusting abominations creeping through the void of space and across dimensions, these monsters not only provoke palpable fear among players, their very existence brings unforgettably cinematic adventure to your own setting, the official Starfinder setting, or the Grimmerspace setting!

Each extensively detailed creature comes with a host of deeply unsettling special abilities and an intriguing background, ranging from wasteland-speeding mutants and agony-fueled, sentient constructs to customizable kaiju, not to mention an entire lost race of incorporeal bogeypeople waiting on the other side of the mirror for the chance to possess us.

 In Xeno Files you'll find the following, unless it finds you first:

  • 40 nerve-rattling monsters, ranging from the CR 1 yhalkym, a devious trap maker bent on cruelest revenge, to the CR 25 zyrag, a draconic starship level construct!

  • New afflictions, creature companions, environmental grafts, subtypes, technologies, template grafts, universal monster rules, weapons, and more!

  • Jumpstart your adventures with the mysteries revealed in a monster's Secrets section!

  • Eyewitness case reports help bring every Xeno Files monster to nightmarish life!
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
